game.name: Train Simulator: Midland Main Line: Leicester - Derby & Nottingham Route Add-On
game.categories: Single-player, Downloadable Content, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: From the quaint countryside to the towering Ratcliffe Power Station, explore the sights of the East Midlands with Just Trains’ authentic Midland Main Line: Leicester - Derby & Nottingham route.
game.shortDescriptionEn: From the quaint countryside to the towering Ratcliffe Power Station, explore the sights of the East Midlands with Just Trains’ authentic Midland Main Line: Leicester - Derby & Nottingham route.
